description_preview: Read on to discover the fascinating life and accomplishments of the talented reciter, Abdelbasset Abdessamad.
biblio_en:
Sheikh Abdel Basset Abdessamad; one of the most famous reciters in the world. He was born in the Upper Egypt in Qenna governorate in 1929 in a family which give great concern to Quran as he inherited Quran love from his father and grandfather who were reciters too.
He started memorizing Quran in his 6th year with his brothers and he completed the memorization before reaching his 10th year, then he began another step in his journey with Quran by learning the ten recitations when he was 12. After that his good reputation spread in the neighboring villages and cities where he was requested personally for Imamat and recitation in different occasions.
Sheikh Abdel Basset Abdessamad joined the Egyptian radio for Holy Quran in 1951 as he was one the greatest Quran reciters there and he was also the Imam of Al Hussien mosque which is one of the biggest and greatest Egyptian mosques .
Sheikh Abdel Basset Abdessamad was not just an ordinary reciter, but was a well-known Islamic celebrity, He has toured the globe reciting the Holy Quran in many states including Indonesia, India, Malaysia, Pakistan and South Africa and a number of European countries as well as the frequent visits of Arab and Islamic countries.
Sheikh Abdel Basset Abdessamad used to be received warmly in his international visits and he had many awards and honors in recognition and appreciation of his great talent. He died at the age of 61 years in 1988 after long years suffering from diabetes and severe hepatitis (inflammation of the liver) which led to his death.
biblio_fr:
Cheikh Abdelbasset bin Mohammed bin Salim bin Abdul Samad est un grand réciteur du Coran, il est né en 1927 dans le village de Alemraazza- Armant-Qena dans le sud de l'Egypte. Son père le Cheikh Mohammed Abdessamad fut un grand réciteur du coran dans son village.

Abdelbasset Abdessamad a appris le Coran à travers le Cheikh de l'école coranique du village, le Cheikh Mohammed El Amir et a étudié les lectures du Cheikh Mohammed Salim Hamadah. Il a accompli l'apprentissage du Coran à l'âge de 10 ans.

Cheikh Abdelbasset devint un grand réciteur dans le Sud de l'Egypte ( Assai'd), mais l'évènement qui bouscula sa vie fut sa visite en 1950 au mausolée du Sayida Zineb à l'occasion des festivités qui coïncidaient avec sa naissance et qui furent organisées par les grands cheikhs tels que Abdelfattah Che3cha3i, Moustafa Isma'il , Abdeladim Zaher, Abu L3inin Sh3esha3 et d'autres...
Les organisateurs de ces festivités lui demandèrent alors de réciter quelques versets du Coran pendant une dizaine de minutes, le Cheikh lut Sourate Al Ahzab et attira l'attention du public qui demandait au cheikh de continuer sa récitation, une récitation qui a finalement duré une heure et demie.

En 1951, Cheikh Abdelbasset Abdessamad entre à la radio égyptienne, lors de sa première récitation il a lu Sourat Fatir. Une année plus tard il a été désigné comme réciteur de la mosquée Imam Shafe'i, puis de la mosquée Imam EL Hussein en 1985 succédant au Cheikh Mahmoud Ali El Banna.

Le Cheikh Abdelbasset a laissé plusieurs enregistrements radiophoniques de ses récitations coraniques en plus du Coran Muratal et Mujawad. Plusieurs stations de radio du monde musulman gardent les enregistrements que le Cheikh a effectué lors de ses nombreuses visites qui l'ont conduit en Arabie Saoudite où il a accompli le Hajj en 1952 et a récité à la Mecque et à Médine, Syrie, Emirats Arabes unis, Maroc, Inde, Pakistan, Indonésie, Afrique du Sud, la mosquée d'Al Quds et la mosquée Ibrahimi en Palestine, France, Royaume Uni, Etats unis d'Amérique, ainsi que d'autres pays des 5 continents.

Cheikh Abdelbasset Abdessamad fut le premier président du syndicat des réciteurs égyptiens en 1984. Il a reçu plusieurs prix tels que l'Ordre de Mérite en 1956 de la Syrie, l'Odre Alarz du Liban, l'Ordre de la médaille d'Or de la Malaisie, des prix en provenance du Sénégal et du Maroc. Le dernier prix qu'il a reçu fut après son décès par le président Egyptien Husni Mubarak à l'occasion de la célébration de la nuit sacrée en 1990.

Cheikh Abdel Basset est décédé le 30 novembre 1988.
biblio_ar:
الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد من قراء القرءان الكريم ذوي الشهرة العالمية، و هو من مواليد صعيد مصر بمحافظة قنا عام 1929. تربى الشيخ و نشأ وسط أسرة ذات اهتمام بالغ بالقرءان و قد ورث الشيخ حفظ القرءان و إتقان التلاوة عن أبيه و جده اللذين كانا أيضاً من حفظة القرءان الكريم.
بدأ الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد حفظ القراءن في العاشرة من عمره مع أخوته و أتم ذلك دون أن يبلغ العاشرة، ثم خطى الشيخ عبدالباسط خطوة أخرى متقدمة في التلاوة بدراسة و إتقان القراءات العشر للقرءان الكريم في سن الثانية عشرة، ثم ذاع صيت الشيخ في القرى و المدن المجاورة حيث كان يتم طلبه شخصياً للصلاة و تلاوة القرءان في المناسبات المختلفة.
انضم الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد للإذاعة المصرية عام 1951 في وقت كانت تذخر فيه الإذاعة آنذاك بالعديد من القراء المميزين و كان الشيخ عبدالباسط من أبرزهم. أيضاً تولى الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد إمامة مسجد الحسين و هو من أكبر و أشهر المساجد المصرية.
الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد لم يكن مجرد قارئاً عادياً بل كان قامة إسلامية معروفة ، و قد طاف الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد بأرجاء المعمورة يتلو القرءان و يصدح به، فقد زار الشيخ دولاً و مدناً متعددة حول العالم و منها: إندونسيا و الهند و ماليزيا و باكستان و جنوب أفريقيا و عدد من الدول الأوروبية بالإضافة إلى زياراته المتكررة للدول العربية و الإسلامية.
كان الشيخ عبدالباسط عبد الصمد يُستقبل استقبالاً حافلاً في زياراته الخارجية ، و قد حاز الشيخ الكثير من الجوائز و الأوسمة عرفاناً بفضله و تقديراً لموهبته الفذة في التلاوة. توفى الشيخ عبدالباسط عبدالصمد عن عمر بلغ 61 عاماً في سنة 1988 بعد سنوات طويلة من الإصابة بمرض السكري و التهاب كبدي حاد أدى إلى وفاته.
biblio_html_en:
Abdelbasset Abdessamad, born in 1927 in a village called Armant in southern Egypt, near Luxor, remains one of the most celebrated and influential Quran reciters of the 20th century. He is known all over the world as he was able to convey all the beauty, emotional depth and spirituality in his  recitations of the Qur'an. He traveled a long way from a small village in Egypt to have his voice heard by people around the world and witnessed his talent and unwavering dedication to his faith and cause.

Abdelbasset was born into a family deeply rooted in Islamic tradition and knowledge. His father was an Imam in the local mosque, and it was under his guidance that Abdelbasset began memorizing the Quran at a young age. His exceptional talent was evident early on, and by the age of 10, he had memorized the entire Quran. His passion for reading the Quran led him to study at Al-Azhar University. Center for Islamic Education, where he can perfect his skills and delve into Islamic jurisprudence.

Abdelbasset's unique recitation style, characterized by its melodious tone and precise articulation, quickly gained him widespread recognition. His ability to convey the emotional and spiritual depth of the Quranic verses made his recitations resonate deeply with listeners. He became the official reciter of the mosque of his hometown and later of the prestigious Al-Imam Al-Hussein Mosque in Cairo.

Abdelbasset Abdessamad: Global Influence and Legacy

Abdelbasset Abdessamad's influence extends far beyond the borders of Egypt. His recitations have been broadcasted worldwide, bringing the beauty of the Quran to millions of homes. His international tours in countries across Asia, Europe, and Africa helped popularize Quranic recitation and inspired a new generation of reciters.

Key Contributions and Achievements of Abdulbasit Abdusamad:

  • Mastery of Tajweed: Abd Al-Bâsit was renowned for his strict adherence to the rules of Tajweed, ensuring that every letter and word of the Quran was pronounced with perfect clarity and precision.

  • Emotional Recitation: His ability to infuse each recitation with profound emotion and spirituality made his recitations a deeply moving experience for listeners, encouraging reflection and a deeper connection to the divine.

  • Innovative Recitation Styles: Abd Al Basset is credited with popularizing the "Warsh" recitation style outside of North Africa, showcasing the rich diversity of Quranic recitation traditions.

  • Inspiration to Future Generations: His legacy continues to inspire both listeners and aspiring reciters around the world, fostering a deep appreciation for the art of Quranic recitation.

  • Extensive Recordings: Abdelbasset's recordings of the Quran, including both studio and live performances, have been widely distributed, making his recitations some of the most listened to in the world.

  • Humanitarian Work: Beyond his recitations, Abdelbasset was known for his humanitarian efforts, using his influence to support charitable causes and promote social justice.

  • Global Ambassador for Islam: Through his travels and recitations, Abdulbasit served as an ambassador for Islam, showcasing the beauty and depth of Islamic spirituality to diverse audiences worldwide.

  • Legacy of Peace and Unity: His work has contributed to a greater understanding and unity among Muslims of different backgrounds and cultures, highlighting the unifying power of the Quran.

His timeless recitations became an inspiration to many, a source of guidance and comfort. Abdelbasset's influence proves that the human voice can unite people, become a symbol of faith and inspire generations to work on themselves. His name has become synonymous with the pinnacle of Quranic recitation.

In an era where technology was not as pervasive, Abdelbasset Abdessamad's voice transcended technological limitations, reaching into the depths of the human heart through radio waves and cassette tapes, which were shared fervently among communities. His timeless recitations became a spiritual companion for many, serving as a source of guidance, comfort, and inspiration. His legacy is not merely in the recordings he left behind but in the collective memory of the Muslim ummah, where his name is synonymous with the peak of Quranic recitation artistry. Abdelbasset's influence is a testament to the power of faith, art, and the human voice to inspire and unite across time and space, leaving an indelible mark on the world.
